item.title: Add MathJax v3 Support to Jekyll and Hugo
item.description: I was using Mathjax v2 for a while and I heard v3 perform significantly better than v2. Many great tutorials explains explains how to add Mathjax support to Jekyll websites. Some of them only cover Mathjax v2. So here is the brief summary on how to add Mathjax v3 support to your Jekyll website (Recently I’ve migrated to Hugo but adding support to Hugo is also pretty similar)

item.title: How to Put Papers on ArXiv
item.description: I was recently trying to put my research paper draft on ArXiv. I thought it would be as simple as submitting the pdf file, which should take approximately less than ten minutes. I was wrong. It took several hours to figure what was going on. I included some tips here to prevent mistakes I made from happening again
